name: Fluffy (itch) (umuttaylanduran)
description:
Fluffy is a 2D Platform game. Which you are a little girl who try's to find his lost teddy bear. You need to find all bear parts in the 6 level. Good Luck! but be careful of hand's.

- Controls -

- W - Jump

-  A - Left 

- D - Right  

- E - Unblock (circuit breaker)

- Up Arrow -  Jump
- Left Arrow - Left
- Right Arrow - Sağ
